title: The 20 Minute Protocol Review That Prevents Weeks of Rework
summary: A fast, structured pre-execution review that catches missing tests, bad sampling plans, and misaligned acceptance criteria before execution, avoiding rework and launch delays.

title: Three Case Studies: Traceability and Documentation Failures
summary: Three real-world scenarios where small documentation gaps created large compliance and schedule impacts in production systems.

title: The Tests That Predict Process Failure
summary: Three simple screening tests that forecast whether a process will fail in production: stability under load, sensitivity to variation, and margin against worst-case inputs.
